title: fc885429.DataEngSG.001
frontText: The DP‐203 exam is titled ___________________ on Microsoft Azure.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.003
frontText: Name four Azure messaging products.
backText: Event Hubs, Event Grid, Service Bus, Azure Queue Storage

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.004
frontText: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) has to do with ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.005
frontText: An Azure VNet has to do with ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.006
frontText: An Azure VM falls into the ___________________ cloud service model.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.007
frontText: An Azure App Service falls into the ___________________ cloud service model.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.009
frontText: Are IaaS, PaaS, FaaS, and LaaS all cloud service offerings available on Azure?
backText: No. LaaS is not a cloud service offering available on Azure.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.010
frontText: Which three items can be stored in an Azure key vault?

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.011
frontText: ___________________ files perform better for temporarily storing intermediate data between different stages in an application.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.012
frontText: ___________________ files are best suited for batch processing.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.013
frontText: Name three ways data can be classified: ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.015
frontText: The ___________________ method parses a JSON document and places each component in the array into its own column.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.016
frontText: The ___________________ command is useful for discovering the query plan of a SQL statement run on Azure Synapse Analytics.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.017
frontText: AVG, MAX, MIN, SUM, and COUNT are all ___________________ functions.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.018
frontText: Use the ___________________ command statement to apply a search condition to a GROUP BY clause.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.019
frontText: ___________________ are small snippets of code that get executed when you reference to the function name.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.020
frontText: Analyzing historical data as means to determine what will happen in the future is considered ___________________ analytics.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.021
frontText: A dimension table with INSERT_DATE and MODIFIED_DATE columns is considered a Type ___________________ SCD table.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.022
frontText: A dimension table with a surrogate key and START_DATE, END_DATE, and IS_CURRENT flag columns is considered a Type ___________________ SCD table.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.023
frontText: A dimension table with the original value, current value, INSERT_DATE, and MODIFIED_DATE columns is considered a Type ___________________ SCD table.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.024
frontText: When a dimension table contains all the necessary columns to comply with a Type 1, Type 2, and Type 3 SCD table, the table is a Type ___________________ SCD table.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.025
frontText: In order to provision an ADLS container, you must enable the ___________________ namespace.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.026
frontText: When using a datetime as the basis to store data files into a folder directory, the most efficient structure is ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.027
frontText: A data landing zone (DLZ) divides data states through the transformation stage into ___________________, ___________________, or ___________________ levels.
backText: (raw file, raw, bronze), (raw data, enriched, silver), (business data, workspace, gold)

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.028
frontText: ___________________ is the default distribution type for an Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pool.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.029
frontText: How many distributions for a dedicated SQL pool are created by default?

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.030
frontText: ___________________ is information that describes data.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.031
frontText: Reading files from disk is considered an ___________________ operation.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.032
frontText: When a file extension is .zip, .tar, or .gz, the data in those files is ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.033
frontText: Data ___________________ and ___________________ result in data being spread across distributions, which reduces the dataset size and increases performance.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.034
frontText: The ___________________ distribution is most optimal for dimension tables.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.035
frontText: If one datacenter in the region becomes unavailable, having the ___________________ storage tier enabled will prevent your data from being unavailable.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.036
frontText: In order to run your analytics code from an Apache Spark pool in an Azure Synapse Analytics workspace, you first need to create a ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.037
frontText: CRUD operations are ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.038
frontText: External tables are implemented on a ___________________ SQL pool and use ___________________, which provides the ability to perform SQL queries on data files in an ADLS container.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.039
frontText: A star schema contains a ___________________ table and one or more ___________________ tables.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.040
frontText: Azure ___________________ and Azure ___________________ provide almost the same capabilities, with Azure ___________________ being the go‐forward, long‐term solution for performing data analytics on Azure.
backText: Data Factory, Synapse Analytics, Synapse Analytics

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.041
frontText: Name the three types of pools available in Azure Synapse Analytics.
backText: serverless SQL, dedicated SQL, Apache Spark

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.042
frontText: Name the five phases of the big data pipeline.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.043
frontText: The ___________________ activity in an Azure Synapse Analytics pipeline is where you will find the most powerful transformation capabilities.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.044
frontText: If you wanted to run T‐SQL queries on your data using the Azure Synapse Analytics workspace, you would attach to either a ___________________ pool or a ___________________ pool.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.045
frontText: If you want to run PySpark (Python), Spark (Scala), or SparkR (R) code on your data using the Azure Synapse Analytics workspace, you would attach to an ___________________ pool.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.046
frontText: Azure ___________________ and Azure ___________________ offer Apache Spark clusters for running data analytics on the Azure platform.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.047
frontText: ACSII, HEX, Unicode, and UTF‐8 are all forms of ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.048
frontText: To set the collection set that defines how your data will be encoded and decoded, you should use the ___________________ SQL command.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.049
frontText: 0NF, 1NF, 2NF, and 3NF are all forms of ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.050
frontText: The Scala programming language uses the ___________________ runtime to manage its code execution.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.051
frontText: Both Azure ___________________ and Azure ___________________ Spark provide high‐performance computing batch capabilities.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.052
frontText: Serving/servicing, batch, and stream layers make up the ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.053
frontText: Running an Azure Batch job from an Azure Synapse Analytics pipeline requires a ___________________ activity.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.054
frontText: If you want to trigger a pipeline at regular intervals, you should configure a ___________________ trigger.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.055
frontText: If you have interdependent pipelines that can be completed later than expected on occasion, you should trigger your pipeline using a ___________________ trigger.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.056
frontText: If you want to trigger an Azure Synapse Analytics pipeline based on an event from Azure Event Grid, you should configure a ___________________ trigger.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.057
frontText: When passing parameters to an Apache Spark job that executes within an Azure Synapse Analytics pipeline, you would pass them as ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.058
frontText: Which two log files are useful for checking the status of an Apache Spark application?

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.059
frontText: To implement an UPSERT, you would use the ___________________ SQL command.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.060
frontText: The UPSERT function performs a(n) ___________________ when the data does not exist and a(n) ___________________ when it does.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.061
frontText: Name three Azure messaging products that are designed for high‐frequency data ingestion.
backText: Event Hubs, IoT Hub, Apache Kafka on HDInsight

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.062
frontText: Azure Stream Analytics supports both ___________________ and ___________________ languages for transforming streamed data.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.063
frontText: What three things does an Azure Stream Analytics job require to process a data stream?

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.064
frontText: If you need to improve performance for your Azure Stream Analytics job, you can optimize your ___________________ or add more ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.065
frontText: To run JavaScript against your Azure Stream Analytics job, you would use a ___________________ from the Functions blade in the Azure portal.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.066
frontText: To visualize a data stream in real time, you can configure ___________________ as an Azure Stream Analytics Output.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.067
frontText: In addition to Azure Stream Analytics, Azure ___________________ using an ___________________ Kafka cluster can be used to manage a data streaming solution on the Azure platform.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.068
frontText: To achieve maximum throughput of your data stream using an Azure Stream Analytics job, the number of input partitions must be ___________________ the number of output partitions.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.069
frontText: To effectively partition your data stream you can use the ___________________ SQL command or set the Compatibility level to ___________________ or greater.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.070
frontText: A ___________________ is an indicator that marks the point at which the event message has been ingressed by the stream processor.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.071
frontText: What are the four layers of a layered security model?
backText: Network security, access management, threat protection, information protection

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.072
frontText: Name three things Azure Key Vault stores.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.073
frontText: A password or connection string would be stored in an Azure key vault as a ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.074
frontText: To retrieve a key from an Azure key vault, the requestor must have the ___________________ Key permission.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.075
frontText: Public, General, Confidential, and Highly Confidential are examples of data ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.076
frontText: Obfuscating a portion of data so that the entire meaning cannot be determined is called ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.077
frontText: In ADLS, the ability to delete a file can be controlled by either a(n) ___________________ or a(n) ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.078
frontText: When auditing is enabled for a dedicated SQL pool, the logs are written to the ___________________ table on the targeted Azure Monitor Log Analytics cluster.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.079
frontText: ___________________ is a built‐in SQL pool feature that will search your database and provide data classification recommendations.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.080
frontText: Name three access control list permissions available on ADLS.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.081
frontText: ___________________ can be configured to notify teams when an error in a pipeline occurs.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.082
frontText: ___________________ are used to monitor the performance and availability of an Azure product.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.083
frontText: ___________________ is used to monitor performance and availability of you application running on the Azure platform.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.084
frontText: ___________________ is the place where Azure Monitor and Diagnostic data is stored.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.085
frontText: The ___________________ is used to query data residing on an Azure Monitor Log analytics cluster.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.086
frontText: Configuring ___________________ for your Azure resources results in performance, usage, and availability data being logged into a Log Analytics cluster.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.087
frontText: ___________________ are also very useful for monitoring the health of your Azure resource.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.088
frontText: Current and historical Azure Synapse Analytics pipeline run status can be found on the ___________________ hub within the Azure Synapse Analytics workspace.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.089
frontText: To view Activity Monitor detail logs of an activity that run within an Azure Synapse Analytics pipeline, view the ___________________ page from the Monitor hub.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.090
frontText: A ___________________ provides a very detailed execution path description of an Apache Spark job.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.091
frontText: Review the ___________________ to analyze the path by which a query is run.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.092
frontText: An index will result in faster query execution because a ___________________ is avoided.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.093
frontText: Running a query against the ___________________.DMV will list all steps taken for a given query.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.094
frontText: To determine whether result set caching is enabled, you should check the is_result_set_caching_on column on the ___________________ DMV.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.095
frontText: In order to enable HTAP, you need to have a(n) ___________________ index.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.096
frontText: A datastore that can handle HTAP operations means it manages both ___________________ and ___________________ operations simultaneously.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.097
frontText: A ___________________ activity dependency/condition is an enabler for recovering from a failed activity that occurred in an Azure Synapse Analytics pipeline or Azure Data Factory.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.098
frontText: Scaling Azure Batch pools requires a script‐based ___________________.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.099
frontText: In order to gain zone replication for an Azure Stream Analytics job, you must run on a ___________________ Stream Analytics cluster.

title: fc885429.DataEngSG.100
frontText: To dynamically scale Apache Spark pools or Azure Batch pools at runtime, you can use the ___________________ to script the scaling logic.
